E.2 The process view concept There may be cases where a unified focus is needed for activities and tasks that are selected from disparate processes to provide visibility to a significant concept or thread that cuts across the processes employed across the life cycle. It is useful to advise users of this document how to identify and define these activities for their use, even though they cannot locate a single process that addresses their specific concern.
